trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when an ongoing operation is aborted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户中止正在进行的操作时，引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates that an operation has been aborted by the consumer of an API.
trans-unit.target: 此异常指示 API 的使用者已中止操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the event handler of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied> event sets the **Abort** property to `true` in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs> object passed to the handler, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> method stops sending rows to the server and throws an OperationAbortedException.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果的事件处理程序<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied>事件集**中止**属性`true`中<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs>对象传递给处理程序，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>方法将停止将行发送到服务器，并引发 OperationAbortedException。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied>
